name: SUPER Patchouli's WHACK-A-KOA 64
description:
Happy Patchouli Day! This is a short, silly and simple Touhou fan game for best librarian on her special day.

Koakumas have wrecked the library. With book in hand Patchouli must discipline her errant assistants (but please refrain from hurting the fairy maids)!

I was pressed for time but I might add more content, polish and other QOL things in a future update.

-keyboard controls only until later date-

Have a great Patchouli Day
6月9日 パチュリーの日

SUPER Patchouli's WHACK-A-KOA 64  ::version 1.00::       -6/9/2021
